Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock survived being targeted by Reece Topley and Moeen Ali, and milked England's quicks for runs
Anrich Nortje became his nation's leading wicket-taker in a men's T20 World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: Captain Aiden Markram's confidence to mix things up and change his plans when it comes to his attack may prove crucial in the latter stages of the competition
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa maintained their perfect record in the tournament
David Miller's match-winning mindset remains firmly in place as the tournament progresses
Others: The Saint Lucia wicket gave South Africa great confidence that Miller's match-winning mindset remains firmly in place
South Africa's attack is going under the radar a little in a tournament that's been all about the bowlers
